name: The Legend of Sleezer
description:
Defeat the Evil Monster and Save the World!

Made for the Easy Allies Glinny's Cauldron Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/glinnys-cauldron-jam

Watch how the Game was made https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rmeSwk6AOO4

Learn how to Make your own Games https://www.youtube.com/c/CodeMonkeyUnity

Thanks for playing!
